# GDS Storybook Documentation - Engineer Reference

> Engineer-focused documentation for Global Design System React components.

## Overview

This documentation is generated from `GDS-storybook-originals/` and provides:
- React component imports and usage
- TypeScript props and types
- Code examples
- Storybook URLs for interactive testing

## Package

```tsx
import { ComponentName } from '@gds/components';
```

## Components (52)

### Form Components
- InputField - Text input with label and validation
- PasswordInput - Secure password entry
- TextArea - Multi-line text input
- TextAreaLimited - Character-limited textarea
- TextInput - Basic text input
- Checkbox - Checkbox with label
- RadioButton - Radio button selection
- Toggle - On/off toggle switch
- ToggleSwitch - Alternative toggle
- SelectInput - Dropdown selection
- DoubleRangeInput - Min/max range slider
- DateOfBirth - Date of birth picker
- CountryPicker - Country selection
- PhoneNumber - Phone number input

### Buttons
- Button - Primary action button (variants: primary, secondary, tertiary, ghost)
- CircleButton - Circular icon button
- SquareButton - Square icon button
- PillButton - Pill-shaped button
- PaginationButton - Page navigation

### Feedback
- AlertBox - Alert messages
- ErrorMessage - Error display
- SuccessMessage - Success confirmation
- Toast - Toast notifications
- Tooltip - Hover tooltips
- LoadingSpinner - Loading indicator
- Skeleton - Loading placeholder

### Layout
- Card - Content container
- Modal - Dialog overlay
- SidePanel - Slide-out panel
- Accordion - Expandable sections
- Header - Page header
- Footer - Page footer

### Typography
- DisplayHeading - Large display text
- SectionHeading - Section titles
- TitleHeading - Page titles
- TextStyle - Text formatting

### Specialized
- Badge - Status badges
- Stepper - Step indicator
- Countdown / CountdownTimer - Timer display
- TicketCardv2 - Ticket display
- SeatInfo / SeatInfov2 - Seat information
- ShareCard - Social sharing
- BrandLogo - Logo display
- Link - Navigation links

## Design Tokens

### Spacing (px)
- lounge: 4
- club: 8
- hall: 12
- auditorium: 16
- theatre: 20
- amphitheatre: 24
- arena: 32
- stadium: 48
- dome: 64
- field: 88

### Colors
- neptune: #024DDF (primary blue)
- cosmos: #121212 (dark)
- earth: #01A469 (success green)
- mars: #EB0000 (error red)

## Storybook

Local: http://localhost:6006
Run: `npm run storybook`

## Source

GitHub: github.com/jamesodwyerGDS/GDS-MCP
GitMCP: gitmcp.io/jamesodwyerGDS/GDS-MCP
